attributes.action: RE-OPEN A&E FACILITY AT CRAWLEY HOSPITAL
attributes.additional_details: The transfer of A&E Services from Crawley General Hospital to East Surrey General Hospital, Redhill has proved ineffective and medical staff cannot cope with the additional demand from West Sussex residents. The decision to close A&E services at Crawley should now be reversed.

rejection.details: This is a local decision - please provide a clear statement explaining what action you want the Governmnet to take
